marytts.modules.acoustic
Class ProsodyElementHandler

java.lang.Object
  marytts.modules.acoustic.ProsodyElementHandler

public class ProsodyElementHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This module will apply prosody modifications to the already predicted values (dur and f0) in the acoustparams This class also support SSML recommendations of 'prosody' element

Author:
Sathish Pammi

process

getF0Contour

public double[] getF0Contour(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nl,
                             int arraysize)
To get a continuous pitch contour from nodelist of "ph" elements

Parameters:
nl - - NodeList of 'ph' elements; All elements in this NodeList should be 'ph' elements only All these 'ph' elements should contain 'd', 'end' attributes
arraysize - the length of the output pitch contour array (arraysize > 0)
Returns:
a double array of pitch contour
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if NodeList is null or it contains elements other than 'ph' elements
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given 'ph' elements do not contain 'd' or 'end' attributes
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given arraysize is not greater than zero
